programme.desc: Unhappy with his capitalistic lifestyle, a white-collared insomniac forms an underground fight club with Tyler, a careless soap salesman. Soon, their venture spirals down into something sinister.

programme.title: The Godfather Coda: The Death of Michael Corleone
programme.desc: A guilt-ridden Michael Corleone tries to quit the world of crime and legitimize his family's interests. However, he has to battle rising members of the underworld and is helped by his nephew.

programme.title: Man On Fire
programme.desc: An ex-CIA agent, Creasy, is hired as a bodyguard to a 12-year old girl, Sam, and the two form a special bond. After she is kidnapped, Creasy vows vengeance on the kidnappers.

programme.title: The Best of Enemies
programme.desc: Civil rights activist Ann Atwater and local Ku Klux Klan leader C P Ellis co-chair a meeting to discuss the end of racial segregation of schools in their city.

programme.title: Birdman
programme.desc: Riggan Thomson, a fading cinema star, plans to resurrect his career with a passionate Broadway production. However, during rehearsals, his co-star is injured forcing him to hire a new actor.

programme.title: Gone Girl
programme.desc: Nick Dunne discovers that the entire media focus has shifted on him when his wife, Amy Dunne, mysteriously disappears on the day of their fifth wedding anniversary.

programme.title: Stay
programme.desc: Sam, a psychiatrist, embarks on a nightmarish journey when Henry, a student, informs him of his plans to commit suicide. However, he must maintain his grip on reality while trying to save his patient.

programme.title: Moon
programme.desc: Sam is working on a station based on the moon which mines an alternative fuel. When his three-year contract is about to end, he meets in an accident that leads him to discover a sinister ploy.

programme.title: The Godfather
programme.desc: When the patriarch of a powerful mafia clan decides to transfer the power of attorney to his youngest son, the life of his family members comes under threat.

programme.title: Wild For The Night
programme.desc: When an ex-convict returns home to solve his sister's murder, the authority forces him to go undercover to help them bust illegal activities at a nightclub.

programme.title: Land Of The Bears
programme.desc: The filmmaker observes the mannerisms, daily activities and adventures of five wild brown bears in the Kamchatka Peninsula.

programme.title: Fallen
programme.desc: Detective John Hobbes witnesses the execution of a demonic serial killer, Edgar Reese. However, the killings resume and are very similar to the style of Reese.

programme.title: JFK
programme.desc: When lawyer Jim Garrison sets out to uncover the mystery behind the assassination of former US President John F Kennedy, he faces strong opposition from the government.

programme.title: The Internship
programme.desc: Two salesmen whose careers have been affected due to digitalisation take up the internship at Google and compete with younger skilled IT geniuses.

programme.title: Rocketman
programme.desc: After completing his studies, Reginald begins to perform rock music at local pubs. Later, he meets John Reid, a music manager, who helps him rise to fame, but also creates chaos in his life.

programme.title: Guilty By Suspicion
programme.desc: Owing to his alleged involvement with communist parties, film director David Merrill is forbidden from working in Hollywood. He decides to fight for his rights and faces numerous challenges.

programme.title: Revolutionary Road
programme.desc: A near perfect couple decide to transfer to Paris in order to escape their satiated lives but their relationship starts to strain when the woman's pregnancy force them to change their plan.

programme.title: If Beale Street Could Talk
programme.desc: The lives of childhood friends and lovers Tish and Fonny take a drastic turn when Fonny gets falsely accused of rape. A pregnant Tish then sets out to prove his innocence.

programme.title: The Revenant
programme.desc: Frontiersman Hugh Glass is severely injured in a bear attack and abandoned by his hunting crew. Refusing to give up, he uses his skills to survive and take revenge on the companion who betrayed him.

programme.title: A Time To Kill
programme.desc: After his ten-year-old daughter is raped, Carl murders her perpetrators. He then faces a trial and calls upon his friend Jake Tyler, a lawyer, to help him win the case.

programme.title: True Story

programme.desc: Final Dose

programme.title: Kachche Dhaage
programme.desc: Kachche Dhaage is the story of two step-brothers: Aaftab (Ajay Devgn), a con smuggling goods across the 'Rajasthan-Pakistan' border, and Jay (Saif Ali Khan), a corporate lad. They loathe each other when they meet for the first time, but are soon forced to work together to face unexpected circumstances when they are accused of a crime they have not committed. The BSF, CBI and mafia are all on their tails. This deadly escapade interrupted by personal clashes eventually creates a bond between Aftab and Jay, who must fight against all odds to prove their innocence.

programme.title: Zed Plus
programme.desc: A political satire set in a small town in Rajasthan where the local government is on the verge of collapsing due to factors such as corruption and mismanagement.

programme.title: Nishant Nights End
programme.desc: Vishwam a married man is the son of a powerful landlord. Although he has no vices like his brothers he is obsessed with Sushila the schoolmaster's wife and gets her kidnapped.

programme.title: Kachche Dhaage
programme.desc: Kachche Dhaage is the story of two step-brothers: Aaftab (Ajay Devgn), a con smuggling goods across the 'Rajasthan-Pakistan' border, and Jay (Saif Ali Khan), a corporate lad. They loathe each other when they meet for the first time, but are soon forced to work together to face unexpected circumstances when they are accused of a crime they have not committed. The BSF, CBI and mafia are all on their tails. This deadly escapade interrupted by personal clashes eventually creates a bond between Aftab and Jay, who must fight against all odds to prove their innocence.

programme.title: Chhalia
programme.desc: Set during the time of partition this movie follows the life of a free-spirited lonely man Chhalia. One day Chhalia meets Shanti and falls in love with her. However Shanti has a past of her own which is bound to leave Chhalia heartbroken.

programme.title: Rain
programme.desc: A Bollywood erotic thriller Rain is the story of a blind writer Sandhya Bhatnagar (Meghna Naidu) with a troubled past. One day a sadistic reporter claiming to be her fan coaxes Sandhya into revealing her past which leads to some shocking truths resurfacing. Who is this person? What is his real intention of visiting a seemingly harmless writer?

programme.title: Dil
programme.desc: Raja, and Madhu, two college-going youngsters, fall in love, and, defying their parents' disapproval, get married. They start to build an affectionate and happy married life together. However, their parents are not done trying to separate them.

programme.title: Sharafat Gayi Tel Lene
programme.desc: A geeky commoner Prithvi Khurana (Zayed Khan) is content with his mediocre job and steady girlfriend. But when his account mysteriously gets credited with 1 million rupees he seeks the help of his philandering slacker roommate Sam (Rannvijay Singh) to solve the mystery.

programme.title: Rudraksh
programme.desc: Bhuria (Sunil Shetty) a contract labourer finds a sacred Rudraksh possessed by Raavan the demon king and thereby acquires supernatural powers. He tries to establish his rule over the universe but is stopped by Varun (Sanjay Dutt) a yogic and a gifted healer. In his mission Varun is supported by his father Pandit Ved Pujan (Kabir Bedi) and researcher Dr. Gayathri (Bipasha Basu).

programme.title: Halla Bol
programme.desc: An aspiring actor from a small town makes his way to the top of the coveted Hindi film industry and attains superstardom. However, his life changes drastically when he becomes the prime witness to a murder but is reluctant to reveal what he has seen.

programme.title: Pathar Ke Insan
programme.desc: A gifted singer Sita and a renowned dancer Lata are two talented sisters who compete to excel in their respective careers. The rivalry between them leads to a competition that has far-reaching psychological consequences.

programme.title: Rudraksh
programme.desc: Bhuria (Sunil Shetty) a contract labourer finds a sacred Rudraksh possessed by Raavan the demon king and thereby acquires supernatural powers. He tries to establish his rule over the universe but is stopped by Varun (Sanjay Dutt) a yogic and a gifted healer. In his mission Varun is supported by his father Pandit Ved Pujan (Kabir Bedi) and researcher Dr. Gayathri (Bipasha Basu).

programme.title: Missing on a Weekend
programme.desc: Seven friends go on a trip to Goa. After a night of partying, one of them is found dead, another becomes unconscious and the rest go missing. Ali, a cop, is given the task of solving this mysterious case.

programme.title: Gandhigiri
programme.desc: Four criminals end up in jail after attempting to rob an NRI’s car. But the NRI is a follower of Gandhi’s philosophy. He bails them out and vows to change their lives.

programme.title: Har Dil Jo Pyar Karega…
programme.desc: Jahnvi’s best friend Pooja attempts suicide when her boyfriend jilts her. Raj, a struggling singer, saves Pooja but she still goes into a coma and Raj gets stuck into caring for her. Upon recovery, Pooja falls for Raj, but he is in love with Jahnvi.

programme.title: Thodi Thodi Si Manmaaniyan
programme.desc: An obedient middle-class boy battles between wanting to pursue a career in rock music and his mother's dream of studying abroad. In the midst of a dilemma he learns an unsettling truth about his dead father which nearly jeopardises his life.

programme.title: Al Morir La Matinee Aka Red Screening
LOTR: THE FELLOWSHIP OF THE RING
LOTR: THE FELLOWSHIP OF THE RING
BEST. EVER. Best Sinful Eats Ever
A Million Ways To Die In The West
BEST. EVER. Best Sinful Eats Ever
Shaolin vs Evil Dead: Ultimate Power
THE CURIOUS CASE of BENJAMIN BUTTON
THE CURIOUS CASE of BENJAMIN BUTTON
SPY KIDS 2: ISLAND of LOST DREAMS
Puss in Boots: the Last Wish
Wedding March 3: Here Comes the Bride
Episode 21 | Sabki Sattvik Aas
programme.desc: The boys express their concern about all the recent food bans in India and prepare for Caulipops, lollipops that look and taste like chicken lollipops, but are 100 per cent vegetarian, just in case someone somewhere calls for a ban on chicken.

programme.title: Episode 2 | Arré Grub | This Week In Food
programme.desc: Trumped Up HOT DOG

programme.title: Episode 25 | Maa Kaun hai?
programme.desc: This Week In Food, the boys take a backseat as their mums take over. They cook the Mother Of All Dals with dollops of TLC aka butter, ghee, and cream. Get a taste of Mamta Ki Mithaas, as they prepare the Franken-dessert thats part gulab jamun, part halwa, and all mamta.

programme.title: The Farm Life | Episode 3
programme.desc: Chef Shagun travels to Nagpur to rustle up tasty treats using the juiciest oranges

programme.title: The Farm Life | Fresh Fruit Chaat
programme.desc: The Farm Life has a mixed bag of oranges and lemons for you

programme.title: Episode 2 | Steven Spielberg Versus Indie Cameraman
programme.desc: The KJo vs Tarantino squabble continues, struggle to make the worlds most viral video. An indie filmmaker makes a special appearance.

programme.title: Episode 1 | Kabhi Kill Kabhi Bill
programme.desc: Two film students Abbaas and Mastan have been hired to make the world’s most viral video.

programme.title: The Farm Life | Episode 2
programme.desc: Youve heard of going bananas but this time Shaguns going guavas in search of this fruit. Join her as she visits yet another farm and whips up a tasty treat

programme.title: Episode 3 | Caliphate to California
programme.desc: A major twist ensues, as the American cameraman discovers that Abbaas and Mastan are not actually terrorists! Will the duo ditch the caliphate and move to California?

programme.title: Episode 1 | Spandan Chukya’s First Day at the Office
programme.desc: Things dont always go according to plan, especially when youre an intern. But for Spandan Chukya, when nothing goes right, you take a left.

programme.title: Official Bhootiyagiri Season 3 Episode 3
programme.desc: Once the hotel gets rebranded, it starts attracting tourists and youngsters who love spooky and eerie places. Dilawar along with his team make up stories and fake ghosts to scare the guests and give them the thriller. All goes well until something unplanned starts happening. People start seeing things that Dilawar did not stage, and this sets him out to find the real culprit behind this. However, as he tries to unravel the truth, some other ugly truths unveil and come staring at him at his face. Now Dilawar knows who sent him to jail. What will he do next? Will Dilawar confront the culprit?

However, in the end, the truth reveals itself and changes everything for Dilawar. He will never be the same person again
